H0.text: In the game ‘Metal Gear Solid’,who is the twin brother of Solid Snake. Big Boss

H1.text: In the game ‘Metal Gear Solid’,who is the twin brother of Solid Snake. Gray Fox

H2.text: In the game ‘Metal Gear Solid’,who is the twin brother of Solid Snake. Otacon

H3.text: In the game ‘Metal Gear Solid’,who is the twin brother of Solid Snake. Liquid Snake

A4.text: Liquid Snake is a product of Les Enfants Terribles, a top-secret government project to artificially create soldiers by cloning the legendary soldier Big Boss.

A5.text: Liquid Snake is almost identical to Solid Snake in terms of facial appearance and physique, with the only difference between them being Liquid's darker skin tone and medium-length blond hair.
